abstract.text: The core framework for Soto, a Swift SDK for AWS

inlineContent.text: SotoCore is the underlying driver for executing requests for the Soto Swift SDK for AWS. You will most likely be using this via one of libraries in
. Much of the public APIs here you will never need to know as they are used internally by the Soto service libraries. But there are a few objects that are used.

abstract.text: Client managing communication with AWS services

decoding based on whether

prior to running operation
Property wrapper that applies a custom encoder and decoder to its wrapped value
Protocol for a PropertyWrapper to properly handle CustomCoding when the wrappedValue is Optional
Middleware that outputs the contents of requests being sent to AWS and the contents of the responses received.
